question: Where are the Eastern Lowland Gorilla?
option1: Rainforests of eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo
answer: Rainforests of eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo
explanation: Eastern Lowland Gorilla are found in the rainforests of eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo. The scientific name of Eastern Lowland Gorilla is Gorilla beringei graueri. Their habitat has shrunk due to civil unrest in Democratic Republic of the Congo.
